metadata.title: CVE-2021-32276 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in faad2 through 2.10.0. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function get_sample() located in output.c. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: faad2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
welle.io package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
